playn.core

Interface GroupLayer.Clipped

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GroupLayer, Layer, Layer.HasSize
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupLayerCanvas.Clipped, GroupLayerGL.Clipped
    Enclosing interface:
    GroupLayer

    public static interface GroupLayer.Clipped
extends GroupLayer, Layer.HasSize
    A clipped group layer.
